models.name: Aurora 2
models.title: Convergence of Cyriss Supernal Coalition Warcaster

characterabilities.name: Caster Adept [Convergence]
characterabilities.description: This model can include Convergence non-character Warjacks in its battlegroup regardless of any other army construction rules. If this model has a bonded Warjack, they may add it to their battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Convergence of Cyriss, Supernal Coalition]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Convergence of Cyriss, Supernal Coalition armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Repairable
characterabilities.description: This model can be targeted with Repair special actions as if it were a construct model.

feat.name: Starstrike Calibration
feat.description: Aurora and friendly Faction models with Flight beginning their activation in Aurora's Control range gain +2 SPD. Additionally, while in Aurora's Control range, friendly Faction models with Flight gain +2 to damage rolls against enemy models without Flight. Starstrike Calibration lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Apparition
execution.description: During your Control Phase, warp this model anywhere completely within 2" of its current location.

topability.name: Battle Directives
topability.description: At any time during its activation, this model can use one of the following directives:

subabilities.name: Ascension Command
subabilities.description: While in this model's command range, friendly models with Flight gain Blast Resistance and Flying High. Ascension Command lasts for one round.

subabilities.name: Phantom Protocol
subabilities.description: While in this model's command range, friendly models with Flight gain Dodge and Reposition [5"]. Phantom Protocol lasts for one round.

subabilities.name: Suppression Initiative
subabilities.description: While in this model's command range, friendly living or construct models with Flight gain Dual Attack. Suppression Initiative lasts for one turn.

ability.name: Free Fall
ability.description: When an enemy model with Flight is hit by this attack it becomes knocked down and loses Flight for one round.

ability.name: Free Fall
ability.description: When an enemy model with Flight is hit by this attack it becomes knocked down and loses Flight for one round.

spells.name: Arcane Propulsion
spells.description: Target non-huge based warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains +2" movement when advancing as part of their Normal Movement, +2 DEF and Flight.

spells.name: Bladed Gale
spells.description: Models hit lose Flight for one round.

spells.name: Hand of Destruction
spells.description: Friendly models in this model's battlegroup gain an additional die on accuracy and damage rolls against target model/unit. Discard the lowest die in each roll.

spells.name: Spirit Door
spells.description: Choose a model in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is in its Control Range. Immediately place that model completely within 2" of the spellcaster. If the chosen model is the spellcaster, immediately place it completely within 2" of another model in its battlegroup that was in its Control Range at the time the spell was cast. A model cannot advance or attack after being placed by Spirit Door this turn.

products.name: Artificer General Nemo & Storm Chaser Adept Caitlin Finch

characterabilities.name: Caster Adept [Cygnar]
characterabilities.description: This model can include Cygnar non-character Warjacks in its battlegroup regardless of any other army construction rules. If this model has a bonded Warjack, they may add it to their battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Cygnar, Supernal Coalition]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Cygnar, Supernal Coalition armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

feat.name: Eye of the Storm
feat.description: When a friendly Faction model makes an electrical damage roll against an enemy model in Nemo's Control range, add an additional die to the damage roll. Eye of the Storm lasts for one turn.

ability.name: Lightning Generator
ability.description: When a model is directly hit with a basic attack made with this weapon, lightning arcs from the model hit to d3 consecutive additional models unless that model has Resistance: Electric. The lightning arcs to the nearest model it has not already arced to within 4" of the last model it arced to ignoring this model and models with Resistance: Electric. Each model the lightning arcs to suffers an unboostable POW 10 Electric damage roll. Lightning arc damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Resolve lightning arc damage rolls simultaneously with the damage resulting from the attack that cause the lighting to arc.

spells.name: Chain Lightning
spells.description: A model hit by Chain Lightning suffers a POW 10 electrical damage roll, and lightning arcs from the model hit to d3 consecutive additional models unless that model has resistance: electricity. The lightning arcs to the nearest model it has not already arced to within 4" of the last model it arced to ignoring models with resistance: electricity ignoring this model. Each model the lightning arcs to suffers an unboostable POW 10 electrical damage roll. Lightning arc damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Chain Lightning damage rolls are simultaneous.

spells.name: Electrify
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 ARM and Repulsor Field. Models are not affected while out of formation. (When a model with Repulsor Field is hit with a melee attack, after the attack is resolved the attacking model is pushed 1" directly away from the model hit.).

spells.name: Force Hammer
spells.description: Instead of suffering a normal damage roll, a non-Incorporeal model Force Hammer hits is slammed d6" directly away from the spell's point of origin and suffers a POW 12 damage roll. Collateral damage from this slam is POW 12.

spells.name: Lightning Shroud
spells.description: Target warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains +2 to Melee Damage rolls and Resistance: Electricity, and its melee weapons gain Electro Leap. (When a model is hit by a basic attack made with a weapon with Electro Leap, you can have lightning arc to the nearest model within 4" of the model hit, ignoring the attacking model and any model with Resistance: electricity. The model the lightning arcs to suffers an unboostable POW 10 electrical damage roll. Lightning arc damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Resolve lightning arc damage rolls simultaneously with the damage resulting from the attack that caused the leap.).

spells.name: Magnetic Field
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, models in its battlegroup cannot become knocked down, cannot be warped or pushed, and cannot be moved by a slam.

characterabilities.name: Companion [Nemo 3]
characterabilities.description: This model is included in any army that includes Nemo 3 and is the same faction as Nemo 3. If Nemo 3 is destroyed or removed from play, remove this model from play. This model is part of Nemo 3's battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Fine Tuning
characterabilities.description: While this model is in formation, Nemo can upkeep one spell without spending focus.

characterabilities.name: Power Booster
characterabilities.description: When Nemo allocates 1 or more focus to a warjack in this model's CMD range, the warjack generates 1 additional focus point.

characterabilities.name: Caster Adept [Cryx]
characterabilities.description: This model can include Cryx non-character Warjacks in its battlegroup regardless of any other army construction rules. If this model has a bonded Warjack, they may add it to their battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Cull Soul
characterabilities.description: This model gains soul tokens from living enemy models that are destroyed within 2" of this model. After this model replenishes focus during your next Control Phase, replace each soul token with 1 focus/fury/essence point.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Unyielding]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Unyielding. (A model with Unyielding gains +2 ARM against melee damage rolls.)

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Cryx, Supernal Coalition]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Cryx, Supernal Coalition armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Soul Taker [Unlimited Tokens]
characterabilities.description: This model can gain soul tokens. There is no limit to how many soul tokens it can carry.

feat.name: Rites of Shadow
feat.description: When an enemy model is forced, casts a spell, or spends 1 or more focus, fury or essence points except to pay tithe while in Asphyxious' Control range, Asphyxious can remove d3 damage points and gains one soul token. If a model casts a spell by spending focus, fury or essence Rites of Shadow triggers only once. Rites of Shadow lasts for once round.

execution.name: Ghost Shield
execution.description: This model gains +1 ARM for each soul token currently on it.

ability.name: Blood Boon
ability.description: Once per activation, immediately after resolving an attack in which it destroyed an enemy model with this weapon, this model can cast a spell with COST 3 or less without spending focus.

spells.name: Calamity
spells.description: Target model/unit suffers -2 DEF and -2 ARM.

spells.name: Cloak of Ash
spells.description: Target Friendly Faction model/unit gains Ashen Veil. Models are not affected while out of formation. (A model with Ashen Veil has concealment. Living enemy models without Resistance: Fire suffer -2 to attack rolls while within 2" of a model with Ashen Veil.

spells.name: Hellfire
spells.description: Models disabled by Hellfire cannot make a Tough roll. Models boxed by Hellfire are removed from play.

spells.name: Hex Blast
spells.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on the model/unit directly hit by Hex Blast immediately expire.

spells.name: Mobility
spells.description: Models in the spellcaster's battlegroup currently in its Control Range gain +2 SPD and Pathfinder for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Attached [Asphyxious The Hellbringer]
characterabilities.description: This model is attached to Asphyxious The Hellbringer. Each Leader can have only one model/unit attached to it.

characterabilities.name: Companion [Asphyxious The Hellbringer]
characterabilities.description: This model is included in any army that includes Asphyxious The Hellbringer and is the same faction as Asphyxious The Hellbringer. If Asphyxious The Hellbringer is destroyed or removed from play, remove this model from play. This model is part of Asphyxious The Hellbringer's battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Death Ripper
characterabilities.description: When a living enemy model is destroyed while in this model's CMD range, Asphyxious gains the destroyed model's soul token.

topability.name: Magic Ability
topability.description: Performing a Magic Ability special action or special attack counts as casting a spell.

subabilities.name: Spectral Leech (★Attack)
subabilities.description: Spectral Leech is a RNG 10 arcane attack that causes no damage. Instead, remove d3 focus, fury or essence points from target model hit. Spectral Leech can only be cat once per turn.

subabilities.name: Spell Slave (★Action) (★Attack)
subabilities.description: This model must be in it's warcaster's Control Range to make the Spell Slave special action. When it does, it casts one of the spells on it's warcaster's card with a COST of 3 or less. This model cannot cast upkeep spells or spells with a RNG of SELF or CTRL. When casting an offensive spell, Spell Slave in a magic attack. Use this model's Magic Ability score when making magic accuracy rolls.

characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Convergence of Cyriss, Supernal Coalition armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

feat.name: Eleventh Hour
feat.description: Friendly Faction models currently in Aurora's Control range gain Resposition [5”] and Unstoppable. Eleventh Hour lasts for one turn. (At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, a model with Reposition [5”] can advance up to 5”. Then its activation ends.)

execution.name: Flying High
execution.description: Ranged attacks targeting this model with a RNG greater than 8 suffers -3 RNG to a minimum of 8. Friendly models can advance through this model if they have enough movement to move completely past its base. This model loses Flying High if it loses Flight.

ability.name: Mechanikal Seizure
ability.description: When a warjack is hit by this weapon, it becomes Stationary for one round.

spells.name: Admonition
spells.description: When an enemy model advances and ends its movement or is warped within 6" of target model in this spellcaster's battlegroup, the affected model can immediately advance up to 3", then Admonition expires.

spells.name: Aerogenesis
spells.description: The spellcaster and friendly Faction warrior models/units beginning their activations in its Control range gain +2 SPD and Flight during their activations. Aerogenesis lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Arcane Might
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly faction non-Leader warrior models can spend 1 focus or fury point on the spellcaster to boost a melee accuracy or melee damage roll during their activations.

spells.name: Bladed Gale
spells.description: Models hit lose Flight for one round.

spells.name: Flashing Blade
spells.description: The spellcaster immediately makes one basic attack with one of its melee weapons against each enemy model in its LOS that is in the weapon's melee range. These attacks are simultaneous.

characterabilities.name: Caster Adept [Convergence and Crucible Guard]

characterabilities.description: RNG 1". Target friendly Faction construct model. If the model is in range, remove d3+3 damage point from it.

characterabilities.name: Resourceful
characterabilities.description: This model can upkeep spells on models in it's battlegroup without spending focus or fury.

feat.name: Arcanodynamic Catalysis
feat.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi in Locke's Control range immediately expire. For one round, when an enemy model is forced, casts a spell, or spends 1 or more essence, focus or fury points while in Locke's Control range, you can place one catalytic token on a model in Locke's battlegroup currently in her Control range. If a model casts a spell by spending essence, focus or fury, Arcanodynamic Catalysis triggers only once. A model cannot have more than three catalytic tokens on it at any time. A model gains +1 DEF and +1 ARM for each catalytic token on it. The weapons of a model with one or more catalytic tokens gain Damage Type: Arcane. Remove one catalytic token from each affected model at the end of its activation.

execution.name: Field Marshal [Cutting Edge]
execution.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Cutting Edge. (When a warjack with Cutting Edge is allocated 1 or more focus points while within its controller’s command range, it is allocated 1 additional focus point. )

ability.name: Critical Knockdown
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit becomes knocked down.

spells.name: Bombshell
spells.description: On a critical hit, models hit are thrown d6" directly away from the attacker. Roll distance once for all models affected. Models thrown do not deviate. Move models farthest from the attacker first. Instead of suffering blast damage, models hit but not directly hit suffer a POW 10 damage roll. The POW of collateral damage is 10.

spells.name: Engine of Destruction
spells.description: The Spellcaster gains +2 SPD, +4 MAT and +4 to melee attack damage rolls for one turn.

spells.name: Jackhammer
spells.description: Target model in the spellcaster's battlegroup immediately makes one basic melee attack.

spells.name: Redline
spells.description: Target warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains +2 SPD and +2 to melee attack damage rolls and can run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks without spending focus. At the end of each of its activations, the affected warjack suffers d3 damage points.

spells.name: Road To War
spells.description: When a friendly Faction model in the spellcaster's Control Range destroys one or more enemy models with a melee or ranged attack during its activation, immediately after the attack is resolved one warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is in its Control Range can advance up to 3". A warjack can advance as a result of Road to War only once per turn.

spells.name: Sentry
spells.description: Target friendly Faction gains Rapid Fire. (A model with Rapid Fire can make one basic ranged attack during your Maintenance Phase.).

characterabilities.name: Battle Configuration
characterabilities.description: Before the start of the game and at the start of each of your Maintenance Phases after your first turn, choose a configuration for this model to take: [Sky Stormer] or [Ground Assault]. Use that configuration's stats and rules for one round.

feat.description: Huxley gains up to 6 focus points. He cannot have more focus points than his current ARC as a result of Initiate Full Auxiliary Power. Huxley can then immediately allocate focus points to warjacks in his battlegroup.

ability.name: Armor-Piercing

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Crucible Guard, Cygnar, Khador, Llael, Ord, Supernal Coalition]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Crucible Guard, Cygnar, Khador, Llael, Ord, Supernal Coalition.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Searforge Commission]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Searforge Commission armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

topability.name: Magic Ability
topability.description: Performing a Magic Ability special action or special attack counts as casting a spell.

subabilities.name: Empower (★Action)
subabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target friendly Faction warjack. If the target warjack is in the range and it was suffering Disruption, it is no longer disrupted. The warjack also gains 1 focus point.

subabilities.name: Flame Burst
subabilities.description: When this model boxes an enemy model with this weapon, enemy models within 1" of the boxed model suffer the Continuous Fire effect.

subabilities.name: Righteous Flames
subabilities.description: An enemy model that ends it's activation within 2" of this model suffers the Continuous Fire effect.

subabilities.name: Smoke Bombs
subabilities.description: Centre a 3" AOE cloud effect on this model. This AOE remains in play for one round.

ability.name: Flame Burst
ability.description: When this model boxes an enemy model with this weapon, enemy models within 1" of the boxed model suffer the Continuous Fire effect.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Crucible Guard, Cygnar, Ord, Protectorate of Menoth, Religion of the Twins, Searforge Commission, Supernal Coalition]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Crucible Guard, Cygnar, Ord, Protectorate of Menoth, Religion of the Twins, Searforge Commission, Supernal Coalition.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Llael]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Llael armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Prowl
characterabilities.description: While this model has concealment, it gains Stealth.

characterabilities.name: Quick Work
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a melee attack during it's Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved, it can make one basic ranged attack.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [3"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 3", then it's activation ends.

characterabilities.name: Vendetta [Khador]
characterabilities.description: This model gains an additional die on all accuracy and damage rolls against Khador.

ability.name: Both Barrels (★Attack)
ability.description: This model gains +4 to the damage roll for this attack. This model cannot make additional ranged attacks with this weapon during an activation in which it makes a Both Barrels Attack.

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Black Penny
subabilities.description: This attack ignores the target in melee DEF bonus.

subabilities.name: Ghost Shot
subabilities.description: This model ignores LOS, Concealment, and cover when making attacks with this weapon.

subabilities.name: Thunderbolt
subabilities.description: Enemy models hit are pushed d3" directly away from the attacking model. On a critical hit, the enemy model becomes knocked down after being pushed.

characterabilities.name: Auto-Repair
characterabilities.description: During your Control Phase, remove d3 damage points from this model.

characterabilities.name: Evasive
characterabilities.description: When this model is hit by an enemy ranged attack, immediately after the attack is resolved this model can advance up to 2".

characterabilities.name: Flying High
characterabilities.description: Ranged attacks targeting this model with a RNG greater than 8 suffers -3 RNG to a minimum of 8. Friendly models can advance through this model if they have enough movement to move completely past its base. This model loses Flying High if it loses Flight.

characterabilities.name: Gun Platform
characterabilities.description: This model can make ranged attacks even while in melee and can target models outside of melee.

characterabilities.name: Propelled [12]
characterabilities.description: This model cannot run, aim, charge, or become knocked down. This model can advance up to 12” total during its Normal Movement. If this model advances less than 12” during its Normal Movement, it can advance its remaining movement at the end of its activation.

characterabilities.name: Shooting Gallery
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 to Ranged accuracy rolls against models within 5” of it.

ability.name: Crater
ability.description: On a direct hit, models hit suffer -2 SPD for one round.

ability.name: Critical Devastation
ability.description: On a critical hit, models hit are thrown d6" directly away from the attacker. Roll distance once for all models affected. Move models farthest from the attacker first. Instead of suffering blast damage, models hit but not directly hit suffer a damage roll with POW of collateral damage is equal to the blast damage POW of this weapon.

ability.name: Siege Weapon
ability.description: This weapon gains an additional die to its damage rolls against huge-based models and structures.

ability.name: Sky-Dropped
ability.description: Attacks with this weapon ignore cover. Models with Flight do not suffer blast damage from this attack.

characterabilities.name: Bottom Floor [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: The lower level of this structure is considered to be concealing terrain.

characterabilities.name: Catastrophic Collapse
characterabilities.description: When this model is destroyed or removed from play, all models inside of it immediately suffer 10 damage. This damage is simultaneous and not considered to have resulted from an attack. Replace this model with all surviving models that were inside of it when it was destroyed.

characterabilities.name: Forward Deployment
characterabilities.description: This model can be deployed up to 8” beyond your deployment zone.

characterabilities.name: Habitable [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Small and medium-based units and solos can enter this structure through a door on the lower level. A model/unit ending its Normal Movement within 1” of the door can choose to enter this building. Models entering this building can be placed on either the lower or upper levels. Models in a unit occupying this structure can be placed on either floor or both. There can be up to six small-based models or three medium-based models on each floor. There must be room for a model's base for it to be placed on either floor.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [any army]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for any army.

characterabilities.name: Movement Inside [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Models/units can use their Normal Movement to be placed on the top floor if they were previously on the lower floor or to be placed on the lower floor if they were on the top floor. Units using their Normal Movement to be placed are considered to have moved. Models cannot otherwise move, warp, or be placed while inside the building.

characterabilities.name: Top Floor [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: The upper level of this structure is considered to be elevated terrain. Additionally, models on the Top Floor gain Snipe. Spells cast from the Top Floor gain +4 RNG.
